name: The Search for the Citrine Pendant
name_original: The Search for the Citrine Pendant
description:
Today's expedition brought me to the deep caves in search of a lost artifact. I was fascinated by the many strata of history layered beneath the surface. Although the journey was laborious, it was all worth it when I finally laid my eyes on the precious gem.

          - Explorer

Made for the Archaeology Bitsy Jam.
